includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Emily Thorne rents the Southampton home she once shared with her father and sets her plan in motion.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Emily Thorne rents the Southampton home she once shared with her father and sets her plan in motion.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Emily Thorne rents the Southampton home she once shared with her father and sets her plan in motion.

includedAssets.title: Trust
includedAssets.synopsis: Emily gets to work on her next target, a former family friend who testified against her father, while Victoria searches for more information on Emily.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Emily gets to work on her next target, a former family friend who testified against her father, while Victoria searches for more information on Emily.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Emily gets to work on her next target, a former family friend who testified against her father, while Victoria searches for more information on Emily.

includedAssets.title: Betrayal
includedAssets.synopsis: With help from her new ally, Emily seeks to destroy the DA who convicted her father. A grieving Victoria tries to confirm her suspicions.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With help from her new ally, Emily seeks to destroy the DA who convicted her father. A grieving Victoria tries to confirm her suspicions.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With help from her new ally, Emily seeks to destroy the DA who convicted her father. A grieving Victoria tries to confirm her suspicions.

includedAssets.title: Duplicity
includedAssets.synopsis: Recent scandals leave the Graysons on edge, Declan and Jack face a tough decision and Emily targets the psychiatrist who institutionalised her.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Recent scandals leave the Graysons on edge, Declan and Jack face a tough decision and Emily targets the psychiatrist who institutionalised her.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Recent scandals leave the Graysons on edge, Declan and Jack face a tough decision and Emily targets the psychiatrist who institutionalised her.

includedAssets.title: Guilt
includedAssets.synopsis: Victoria's vulnerabilities are exposed when feelings of guilt and a fight with her daughter becomes too much. A vindictive Lydia returns.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Victoria's vulnerabilities are exposed when feelings of guilt and a fight with her daughter becomes too much. A vindictive Lydia returns.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Victoria's vulnerabilities are exposed when feelings of guilt and a fight with her daughter becomes too much. A vindictive Lydia returns.

includedAssets.title: Intrigue
includedAssets.synopsis: The Graysons begin to distrust their security after an incriminating video surfaces. Meanwhile, the tension between Emily and Tyler continues.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Graysons begin to distrust their security after an incriminating video surfaces. Meanwhile, the tension between Emily and Tyler continues.

includedAssets.title: Charade
includedAssets.synopsis: A newspaper story interrupts the Graysons' plan to lay low on their 25th wedding anniversary. Frank tries to prove his loyalty to Victoria.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A newspaper story interrupts the Graysons' plan to lay low on their 25th wedding anniversary. Frank tries to prove his loyalty to Victoria.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A newspaper story interrupts the Graysons' plan to lay low on their 25th wedding anniversary. Frank tries to prove his loyalty to Victoria.

includedAssets.title: Treachery
includedAssets.synopsis: Emily's plot continues to unravel, tensions escalate within Victoria's family and Lydia's memory raises concerns with the Graysons.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Emily's plot continues to unravel, tensions escalate within Victoria's family and Lydia's memory raises concerns with the Graysons.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Emily's plot continues to unravel, tensions escalate within Victoria's family and Lydia's memory raises concerns with the Graysons.

includedAssets.title: Suspicion
includedAssets.synopsis: Realising she has lost an ally, Emily turns to her mentor. Meanwhile, Victoria finds herself alone and Tyler's influence continues to threaten.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Realising she has lost an ally, Emily turns to her mentor. Meanwhile, Victoria finds herself alone and Tyler's influence continues to threaten.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Realising she has lost an ally, Emily turns to her mentor. Meanwhile, Victoria finds herself alone and Tyler's influence continues to threaten.

includedAssets.title: Loyalty
includedAssets.synopsis: Emily questions Nolan's loyalty and Amanda settles into life in the Hamptons, while Victoria's relationship with Conrad takes a bad turn.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Emily questions Nolan's loyalty and Amanda settles into life in the Hamptons, while Victoria's relationship with Conrad takes a bad turn.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Emily questions Nolan's loyalty and Amanda settles into life in the Hamptons, while Victoria's relationship with Conrad takes a bad turn.

includedAssets.title: Duress
includedAssets.synopsis: An unstable visitor crashes Daniel's birthday celebration, Conrad and Victoria use Charlotte as a pawn and Emily's plan starts to unravel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An unstable visitor crashes Daniel's birthday celebration, Conrad and Victoria use Charlotte as a pawn and Emily's plan starts to unravel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An unstable visitor crashes Daniel's birthday celebration, Conrad and Victoria use Charlotte as a pawn and Emily's plan starts to unravel.

includedAssets.title: Infamy
includedAssets.synopsis: Emily targets an author with ties to the Graysons and the Clarkes, Conrad fights dirty in the divorce and Jack lets his guard down.

includedAssets.title: Commitment
includedAssets.synopsis: Charlotte moves back in with her mother, Jack's life is put at risk and Nolan makes Emily think cautiously.

includedAssets.title: Perception
includedAssets.synopsis: In the excitement over Emily and Daniel's engagement, things start to unravel. Meanwhile, Victoria uses Conrad's father against him.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the excitement over Emily and Daniel's engagement, things start to unravel. Meanwhile, Victoria uses Conrad's father against him.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the excitement over Emily and Daniel's engagement, things start to unravel. Meanwhile, Victoria uses Conrad's father against him.

includedAssets.title: Chaos
includedAssets.synopsis: Emily's vendetta takes a dark turn, putting everyone in danger. Meanwhile, Jack decides to track down Amanda and Charlotte tries to ease her pain.

includedAssets.title: Scandal
includedAssets.synopsis: The Graysons unite in the face of recent scandal, Emily becomes increasingly anxious and Amanda's location is questioned.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Graysons unite in the face of recent scandal, Emily becomes increasingly anxious and Amanda's location is questioned.

includedAssets.title: Doubt
includedAssets.synopsis: Daniel's imprisonment has an unexpected impact on Victoria and Jack's search for Amanda becomes more desperate.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Daniel's imprisonment has an unexpected impact on Victoria and Jack's search for Amanda becomes more desperate.

includedAssets.title: Justice
includedAssets.synopsis: Emily finds out who was responsible for her father's murder, while Victoria's pawns become entangled in a cover-up.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Emily finds out who was responsible for her father's murder, while Victoria's pawns become entangled in a cover-up.

includedAssets.title: Absolution
includedAssets.synopsis: The press grows increasingly hostile as Daniel's release nears, while Emily makes a discovery that reveals more about her father's death.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The press grows increasingly hostile as Daniel's release nears, while Emily makes a discovery that reveals more about her father's death.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The press grows increasingly hostile as Daniel's release nears, while Emily makes a discovery that reveals more about her father's death.

includedAssets.title: Legacy
includedAssets.synopsis: In 2002, Amanda starts reading her father's journals and staking out the Grayson's home. As her anger grows, she forms a plan to seek justice.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In 2002, Amanda starts reading her father's journals and staking out the Grayson's home. As her anger grows, she forms a plan to seek justice.

includedAssets.title: Grief
includedAssets.synopsis: A devastating loss brings Jack and Emily closer together, while Victoria's new alliance threatens to seal Conrad's fate and Charlotte goes after Declan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A devastating loss brings Jack and Emily closer, while Victoria's new alliance threatens to seal Conrad's fate and Charlotte goes after Declan.

includedAssets.title: Reckoning
includedAssets.synopsis: Emily intends to finally follow through with her plan, while the Graysons continue down a self-destructive path.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: A young woman moves in next door to the wealthy family who wronged her father and sets in motion a plan to exact her revenge. Gripping drama starring Emily VanCamp.
